column3: Percentage of cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Refused
column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False /Mistake of Fact or Law Etc.
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Chargesheets were Laid.
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for investigation in which - Investgation was Completed - Total [Col. 4+5+6]
